single_crochet 1 single_crochet 4 times* repeat ** around the last st in round will go into chain 1 stitch 35 single_crochet r6 chain 1 1 single_crochet * 2 single_crochet single_crochet 6 times* repeat ** 3 times 2 single_crochet single_crochet 5 1 single_crochet into chain 1 space slip_stitch into chain 1 stitch fo leave long tail for sewing 41 single_crochet 🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢 sewing- using brown yarn take turtle belly attach head anywhere on wrong side of circle attach head around r17 to belly the belly will cup around the neck attach front legs to left and right side of head points pointing outward with 2 sts in between head and legs count 4 sts from legs and attach back legs attach tail in the middle of back legs page 8 ** read first before starting** for the shell there are 5 sides on each shell piece choose one for the middle and sew other pieces on each side except on one side sew sides together with your sewing needle using strands you fo with when making the shell pieces when sewing pieces together sew through the front loops only of both piece see pictures once you have all but one shell piece sewn together take the last shell piece and sew only one side to the middle leave the other 2 sides not sewn your shell
